What is your take on the discovery that the Universe has an up and down,
and is somehow sentient?
If it has an up and down, that might mean there is a larger existence outside our universe.
Or perhaps gravity isn't needed in order for there to be an up and down?

Dark Matter and Dark Energy are the very fabric is Space-Time.
These discoveries might have actually proven "God"'s existence.
Anything you can say about God, you can say about Dark Matter, and vise-versa.
It's also speculated that "Souls" are some sort of Electro-Magnetic static,
and can be magnetically charged.
Positively charged "Souls" get pulled into the ground,
while negatively charged "souls" get pushed of the planet.
Non-charged souls don't get pushed or pulled, so they stay, as "ghosts".
"Hell" is nothing more then a crucible of souls, where they are melted down into their base form,
which then flow back to the surface through the "veins" or "lay-lines" of the planet.
"Soul" energy is infused with the Air, and when you breath in your first breath after birth,
you suck in some Soul energy, and get your own soul.
You could suck in new soul energy that's been recycled, or absorb a ghost, creating a rebirth.
This could be where the around "21 grams" weight for the soul comes from,
the Air and soul energy vacuum sealed in your lungs.

These discoveries have shown us that we can create our own flying saucers.
All we need to do is find a way in which we can charge the entire exterior of the space-craft,
with a strong enough negative electro-magnetic charge,
that the planet's magneto-sphere pushes it of the ground.
Then for steering, we'll need a complex weight system,
the weights will determine what way it moves.
